name: ENDURO 3: THE GREAT CROSS EUROPEAN ROAD RACE
name_original: ENDURO 3: THE GREAT CROSS EUROPEAN ROAD RACE
description:
An old-school game tribute to Activision's Euduro (Atari 2600), to The Great American Cross Country Road Race (which we may call Enduro 2) on Atari 8bit computers, and to all the micro-computers stars of the 80s like Jobs, Gates, Sinclair...

The story takes place in the 1980s. Invited by Lord Sinclair, billionaires from the 8-bit video game industry are having fun on the roads of Europe in their sports cars! Their goal ? To win the European Road Race by arriving 1st in Paris!
